name: PanDoo (BolrikDev)
description:
In PanDoo you play as Pan or Doo, two human sized blobs, which try to escape a laboratory.  In order to escape you have to solve some puzzles and escape the crazy scientist.

Jam Version,
There are just a tiny amount of levels. More to come?!
The last (open Area without any kind visible path) level is the playground.
Still missing: Audio... and music!

Have Fun and Thank you for playing

PS: Best played on desktop version
